description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Predict><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>, then draw 1 and reduce its cost by 1.
descriptionRaw: Play: Predict, then draw 1 and reduce its cost by 1.
flavorText: “This little guy just needed a bit of tinkering. Fresh gears here, a new arm there, and they get a new lease on life. Time’s a gift everyone should get a little more of, I say.” - Ekko
name: Augmented Clockling

description: When you play a spell, plant 1 <link=card.trap><style=AssociatedCard>Flashbomb Trap</style></link> in the top 8 cards of the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: When you play a spell, plant 1 Flashbomb Trap in the top 8 cards of the enemy deck.
flavorText: "...And you know what else makes these babies better than mushrooms? You decide when they explode! How's THAT for value?"
name: Flashbomb Peddler

description: Deal 1 to an enemy and the enemy Nexus. Discard up to 2 to increase the damage by 1 for each card discarded.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to an enemy and the enemy Nexus. Discard up to 2 to increase the damage by 1 for each card discarded.
flavorText: “Okay, okay, this may only work once, but trust me, it’s gonna be a blast!” - Jinx
name: Blowback

description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus. The next time an ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> the Nexus this round, create an <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Stylish Shot</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus. The next time an ally strikes the Nexus this round, create an Stylish Shot in hand.
flavorText: “Nobody could keep up with me even if all I had were sticks and stones. With my kit? Don’t even try.” - Samira
name: Stylish Shot

description: <link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link>: Grant me +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Grant me +2|+0.
flavorText: “My fee is steep, and I don’t work for just anybody. If you’re lucky enough to hire me, you get grace, poise, and blades that never miss their mark. But most of all, style. Because who doesn’t love killing with a flourish?”
name: Elegant Edge

description:
<link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link>: I cost 2 less.
Deal 1 to anything and <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw:
Plunder: I cost 2 less.
Deal 1 to anything and Stun an enemy.
flavorText: “What? I was stretching. Don’t tell me you died to me stretching.” - Elegant Edge
name: Pirouette

description: <link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link> or <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Flair</style></link> in hand if you don't already have one.
descriptionRaw: Plunder or strike: Create a Flair in hand if you don't already have one.
levelupDescription: I've seen you play 6 cards. Resets when you start a round with the attack token.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen you play 6 cards. Resets when you start a round with the attack token.
flavorText: “I'm always running down some mark who ran up debts he couldn’t pay. And running from those debts makes you the wrong kind of enemies--the ones who call me.”
name: Samira

description: Give an allied <link=card.samira><style=AssociatedCard>Samira</style></link> <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round or deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Give an allied Samira Challenger this round or deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: “Get too close, you’ll get the steel. Stray too far, you get the lead.” -Samira
name: Flair

description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: “Get too close, you’ll get the steel. Stray too far, you get the lead.” -Samira
name: Flair

description: Give an allied <link=card.samira><style=AssociatedCard>Samira</style></link> <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an allied Samira Challenger this round.
flavorText: “Get too close, you’ll get the steel. Stray too far, you get the lead.” -Samira
name: Flair

description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
<link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link>: Give it +2|+1 instead.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Samira</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Plunder: Give it +2|+1 instead.
Create a Samira in your deck.
flavorText: “Indari’s pulled some strings to get us in without a fuss. Here’s hoping there’ll be time for me to make one on our way out.” - Samira
name: Samira's All Out

description:
<link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link> or <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Flair</style></link> in hand if you don't already have one.
When you play 6 cards, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>. Resets when you start a round with the attack token. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw:
Plunder or strike: Create a Flair in hand if you don't already have one.
When you play 6 cards, Rally. Resets when you start a round with the attack token.
flavorText: “Had a feeling there was more going on here than a little debt evader.  Indari calls these ‘complications.’ I call them flavor.”
name: Samira

description: <link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link>: Double my power.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Double my power.
flavorText: “Look, normally I like to set down some rules--like "paws off the hair and face", but who am I kidding? You won’t lay a finger on me.”
name: Dashing Dandy

description: <link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link>: Grant all allies +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Grant all allies +1|+0.
flavorText: “Ah, Dame. She has a flair for the dramatic, that one. Some might turn their nose up at a little pageantry, but when she’s in her element, we’re all getting paid.” - Elegant Edge
name: Dame the Despoiler

description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
<link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link>: Give it +2|+1 instead.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Plunder: Give it +2|+1 instead.
flavorText: “Indari’s pulled some strings to get us in without a fuss. Here’s hoping there’ll be time for me to make one on our way out.” - Samira
name: All Out

description: When I'm summoned, activate all ally <link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link> effects.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, activate all ally Plunder effects.
flavorText: “Setting up shop can be tricky in some places, but with one look at my and Lani’s wares, the coin was flying. Didn’t see our mark among those perusing, but plenty others with violence on their minds tonight. After all, finding out who wants to kill who is a decent way to get the lay of the land.” - Miel
name: Adroit Artificer

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus or activate an ally's <link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link> effect.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus or activate an ally's Plunder effect.
flavorText: “Being in the weapons business means having a healthy relationship with data. Concept, test, rebuild, modify: all that takes information. There’s nothing like a little field testing to create a healthy sample size, and a few craters!” - Lani
name: Daring Demolisher

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Activate an ally's <link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link> effect.
descriptionRaw: Play: Activate an ally's Plunder effect.
flavorText: “Being in the weapons business means having a healthy relationship with data. Concept, test, rebuild, modify: all that takes information. There’s nothing like a little field testing to create a healthy sample size, and a few craters!” - Lani
name: Daring Demolisher

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: “Being in the weapons business means having a healthy relationship with data. Concept, test, rebuild, modify: all that takes information. There’s nothing like a little field testing to create a healthy sample size, and a few craters!” - Lani
name: Daring Demolisher

description:
When I'm summoned, I <link=vocab.Improvise><style=Vocab>Improvise</style></link>.
<link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link>: <link=vocab.Forge><style=Vocab>Forge</style></link> other allies.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, I Improvise.
Plunder: Forge other allies.
flavorText: “I’ve worked with many operatives before. Some were easy, some a challenge... and then there’s Samira. I made peace with the fact that I can’t reign her in--instead, I direct the bedlam, aim it--and occasionally, join in here and there.”
name: Captain Indari

description: When you refill mana, grant me +1|+0 for each mana refilled.
descriptionRaw: When you refill mana, grant me +1|+0 for each mana refilled.
flavorText: "Little Jack darling, see here! I find something that interest you, yes?"
name: Mad Ol' Babs

description: <link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link>: Summon a random 1 cost follower and grant it <link=keyword.Brash><sprite name=Brash><style=Keyword>Brash</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Summon a random 1 cost follower and grant it Brash.
flavorText: “I’d steer clear of her if I were you. She’s got a real nasty habit of making her problems other people’s.” - Samira
name: Brazen Buccaneer

description:
<link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Coin</style></link> in hand.
When you refill mana, heal me 1 for each mana refilled.
descriptionRaw:
Strike: Create a Coin in hand.
When you refill mana, heal me 1 for each mana refilled.
levelupDescription: You've spent 12+ mana in one round.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've spent 12+ mana in one round.
flavorText: "You've got to be brave or dumb to stand against me, but either way, the outcome's the same. My advice: worry about making it out alive."
name: Jack

description:
<link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Coins</style></link> in hand.
When you refill mana, grant me +1|+0 and heal me 1 for each mana refilled.
descriptionRaw:
Strike: Create 2 Coins in hand.
When you refill mana, grant me +1|+0 and heal me 1 for each mana refilled.
flavorText: “Jack ain’t all bad. In fact, the few who’ve earned his respect might even call him charming, almost decent. But once he gets that blood smell in his nose, well... I don't think there's a more dangerous man alive.” - Bull
name: Jack

description:
Deal 3 to a unit. If this kills it, create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Coins</style></link> in hand.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Jack</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 3 to a unit. If this kills it, create 2 Coins in hand.
Create a Jack in your deck.
flavorText: “Nothing ventured, nothing gained--and these jaws are built for ventures.” - Jack
name: Jack's Risky Venture

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mako</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Fleeting Mako in hand.
flavorText: “Little nick ‘ere, little slice there, all in good fun. Bit ‘o blood in the water never hurt anybody. Well, not me anyways.” - Nukkle
name: Nukkle

description: When you refill mana, create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> random follower in hand you can exactly afford.
descriptionRaw: When you refill mana, create a Fleeting random follower in hand you can exactly afford.
flavorText: “If you want the crimson, then you want Jack. You wanna know the where, the when, the who, and  how much? You talk to me.”
name: Perfidious Promoter

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Bull</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Fleeting Bull in hand.
flavorText: “You’re a small fish. I’d keep swimming.”
name: Mako

description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, Rally.
flavorText: His body a tapestry of scars and ink telling his brutal legend, Bull now serves as mentor and sparring partner to Jack. He's saving that last bit of fighting spirit for an opponent worthy enough to merit one last scrap.
name: Bull

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Coin</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Create a Coin in hand.
flavorText: "Oi, get back here, slimeball! That's my potato money!" - Angel
name: Pocket Picker

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Prize Fight</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Fleeting Prize Fight in hand.
flavorText: “That’s the way, Jackie Boy! Keep dolin’ out the ol' Bilgewater charm, and I’ll keep ye fightin' fit. Ahh, this reminds me of my golden days, when they used to call me 'Pretty-As-A-Picture Pablo'... They didnae, ye say? They did, too! That knock to yer head must've fouled yer memory.” - Five-Punch Pablo
name: Five-Punch Pablo

description: <link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link>: Create 3 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Coins</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Create 3 Coins in hand.
flavorText: "That the best you got? Cute. Now it's my turn."
name: Angel

description: Deal 3 to a unit. If this kills it, create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Coins</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to a unit. If this kills it, create 2 Coins in hand.
flavorText: “Nothing ventured, nothing gained--and these jaws are built for ventures.” - Jack
name: Risky Venture

description:
<link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link>: I cost 2 less.
Draw 2 at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link> and grant them <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Plunder: I cost 2 less.
Draw 2 at the next Round Start and grant them Fleeting.
flavorText: By the time you hear the rattling, it’s already too late to run.
name: Barbed Chain

description: <link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link>: Refill 1 spell mana and create a random 1 cost spell from your regions in hand.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Refill 1 spell mana and create a random 1 cost spell from your regions in hand.
flavorText: Father Fury's origins are as thick as a thundercloud, and even when they've asked, no one's ever heard a straight answer--at least, not one they could hear over the din of his destruction.
name: Father Fury

description: An ally and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other. They can't drop below 1 Health from this <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: An ally and an enemy strike each other. They can't drop below 1 Health from this strike.
flavorText: Sometimes you trade in coin and lamp oil, and sometimes you trade in knuckles and teeth. That’s just the way it is, but an even exchange? That’s good business!
name: Prize Fight

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Coin</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Create a Coin in hand.
flavorText: “Hmmm, now I know they’re not the most traditional piece of kit, yeah I’ll grant you that. But do give ‘em a try, they really grow on ya.” - Bull
name: Barknuckles

description:
When I'm summoned, draw a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Jack</style></link>.
When you summon an ally, create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Prize Fight</style></link> in hand.
When an ally survives damage, grant it <link=keyword.Brash><sprite name=Brash><style=Keyword>Brash</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, draw a Jack.
When you summon an ally, create a Fleeting Prize Fight in hand.
When an ally survives damage, grant it Brash.
flavorText: Jack’s personal vessel has borne him and his ilk across Runeterra's waters, from Bilgewater to Ionia. How it travels underneath the water without sinking is anyone’s guess, but it’s been said that beneath the surface is where the real danger lies...
name: The King's Court

description: When you activate <link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link>, draw 1 and grant it <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When you activate Plunder, draw 1 and grant it Fleeting.
flavorText: “There are certain advantages to being a pyromaniac at sea. Water  doesn’t let a flame get outta hand, and it never asks for a cut.”
name: Inferna

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Coin</style></link> in hand, or spend 5 mana to <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an enemy and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Coin</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Recall an ally and create a Coin in hand, or spend 5 mana to Recall an enemy and create a Coin in hand.
flavorText: “I’ll only come in under two conditions. First, if your opponent is havin’ too much fun wreckin’ ya. Second, you’re the one havin’ too much fun, and I want my piece too!” - Pit Professional
name: Tag Out!

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: The next time you play a unit this round, summon an exact <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy of it.
descriptionRaw: Play: The next time you play a unit this round, summon an exact Ephemeral copy of it.
flavorText: Bingwen the Bird was once a fighter, so called for his cranelike stance and agility. Since retiring, he has taken up the mantle of a trainer--using his keen eye and firm hand to separate the fine talent from the coarse.
name: Master Bingwen, the Sieve

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy. If you've spent 16+ mana this round, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> all enemies instead. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Play: Recall the strongest enemy. If you've spent 16+ mana this round, Recall all enemies instead.
flavorText: "The mask's not comin' off, girl. And unless you wanna end up looking like this thing, don't ask again."
name: The Old Timer

description: The first time I would drop below 1 Health while attacking, give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> instead.
descriptionRaw: The first time I would drop below 1 Health while attacking, give me Barrier instead.
flavorText: Basking in the roar of the crowd packed into his exclusive underground arena, Sett indulges in a rare moment of introspection. He remembers all he fought for, and what might yet come his way. He knows one thing for certain, though: It’s good to be the Boss.
name: Sett

description:
While I'm attacking, I can't take damage or die.
Each round, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Show Stopper</style></link> in hand once you've spent 12+ mana that round. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw:
While I'm attacking, I can't take damage or die.
Each round, create a Show Stopper in hand once you've spent 12+ mana that round.
flavorText: “Problem with bein’ the boss is, for most, ya get soft. Your own callouses start healing, and before long you’re what you swore you’d never be. So I'm grateful for all this chaos. Finally, someone’s bringing the beast outta me!”
name: Sett

description:
<link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Coins</style></link> stack.
Refill <style=Variable>1</style> mana.
descriptionRaw:
Coins stack.
Refill 1 mana.
flavorText: "What can I say? I'm a generous guy." - Sett
name: Coin

description: <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> an enemy. Deal 1 to all other enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Obliterate an enemy. Deal 1 to all other enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "For one moment, just before I shatter your spine to splinters, I'm gonna make you immortal.” - Sett
name: Show Stopper

description:
<link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> 2 enemies and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Coin</style></link> in hand.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Sett</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Stun 2 enemies and create a Coin in hand.
Create a Sett in your deck.
flavorText: “What? He said he’d take it on the chin--he didn't say whose!” - Sett
name: Sett's Facebreaker

description: Other Bird allies have +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Other Bird allies have +1|+0 and Quick Attack.
flavorText: "In these jungles, I've consistently found the most beautiful specimens to be the deadliest predators." - Anura
name: Royal Shimmerwing

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Coin</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Create a Coin in hand.
flavorText: Amid ambitious anglers and self-interested schemers, Lise has the one quality Sett prizes above all: reliability. She is never off, never short, and has never given Sett cause to wonder. This has granted Lise his backing and a warning to any seeking to stir up trouble: Bet against the House, and lose.
name: Attentive Accountant

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3 and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Coin</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Play: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3 and create a Coin in hand.
flavorText: "First round is about saying hello, and the second gets them cozy. Problems come out by the third, and from the fourth on, the lips get real loose--you wouldn't believe the kind of things I hear!"
name: Smooth Mixologist

description: Draw 2 and create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Coins</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Draw 2 and create 2 Coins in hand.
flavorText: “They give us real money, and we give them a chance. Heh… and some really wonder how the House always wins.”
name: Place Your Bets

description: Each round, the first time you play another follower, summon an exact copy of it. If your board is full, grant its stats and keywords to me instead.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time you play another follower, summon an exact copy of it. If your board is full, grant its stats and keywords to me instead.
flavorText: "Think these flowers are worth anything? And don't call me crazy, but do they look like they're... dancing?" - Piltovan Poacher
name: Beguiling Cobra

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy. If you've spent 16+ mana this round, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> all enemies instead.
descriptionRaw: Recall the strongest enemy. If you've spent 16+ mana this round, Recall all enemies instead.
flavorText: “You need this lesson, make no mistake⁠--but you ain’t gonna like it.” - The Old Timer
name: More Than You Can Chew

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Coin</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Coin in hand.
flavorText: “Some are in it for the coin, others the blood, and some for the roar of the crowd. Me? Never could choose just one. I need it all, and I have everything here in spades.”
name: Pit Professional

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Coin</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Recall an ally and create a Coin in hand.
flavorText: “I’ll only come in under two conditions. First, if your opponent is havin’ too much fun wreckin’ ya. Second, you’re the one havin’ too much fun, and I want my piece too!” - Pit Professional
name: Tag Out!

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an enemy and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Coin</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Recall an enemy and create a Coin in hand.
flavorText: “I’ll only come in under two conditions. First, if your opponent is havin’ too much fun wreckin’ ya. Second, you’re the one havin’ too much fun, and I want my piece too!” - Pit Professional
name: Tag Out!

description:
When I'm summoned, create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Bout Security</style></link> in hand and grant other <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Bout Security</style></link> +1|+1.
<link=vocab.Empowered><style=Vocab>Empowered</style></link> 5: <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, create a Fleeting Bout Security in hand and grant other Bout Security +1|+1.
Empowered 5: Quick Attack.
flavorText: “If they think you’re thick, go on and let ‘em. Let the bad apples think they’re safe to run their games--there ain’t a thing in life better than the look in their eyes when they realize they underestimated you.” - Sett
name: Bout Security

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> 2 enemies and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Coin</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Stun 2 enemies and create a Coin in hand.
flavorText: “What? He said he’d take it on the chin--he didn't say whose!” - Sett
name: Facebreaker

description: I have +1|+0 for each <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> ally you've summoned this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: I have +1|+0 for each Ephemeral ally you've summoned this game.
flavorText: “Though you may be naught but grains of sand to this foe, I see you. I feel your presence in the dunes. Lend your strength to me, and we shall bring our enemies low together!”
name: Fallen Sands General

description: When I'm summoned, create at the bottom of your deck two random level 2 champions that aren't in your hand, deck, or play.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create at the bottom of your deck two random level 2 champions that aren't in your hand, deck, or play.
flavorText: He knew not fully what he saw, what shape the calamity might take, or when--but he knows this world and its people. They are not ready. They may never be.
name: Secret Keeper

description: Start a free attack with an exact <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy of each Cat ally.
descriptionRaw: Start a free attack with an exact Ephemeral copy of each Cat ally.
flavorText: A lone huntress is fearsome enough--but a pack is truly ferocious.
name: Pack Attack

description: Spend 6 mana to play me as <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Frostcoat Mother</style></link> instead.
descriptionRaw: Spend 6 mana to play me as Frostcoat Mother instead.
flavorText: There are many dangers in the Freljord, especially for those yet to learn its cold truths.
name: Frostcoat Cub

description:
When I'm summoned, I <link=vocab.Improvise><style=Vocab>Improvise</style></link>.
Each round, the first time you <link=vocab.Forge><style=Vocab>Forge</style></link> or <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equip</style></link> an ally, heal your Nexus 1.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, I Improvise.
Each round, the first time you Forge or Equip an ally, heal your Nexus 1.
flavorText: "The little fuzzball may not be helping me work faster, but he does put a smile on my face. That's help enough." - Innovative Blacksmith
name: Innovative Blacksmith

flavorText: There are many dangers in the Freljord, especially for those yet to learn its cold truths.
name: Frostcoat Cub

flavorText: Luckily for some in the Freljord, they have guardians who see fit that they learn the path of survival, and are not made lessons themselves.
name: Frostcoat Mother

description: I don't take damage from allied spells or <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Skills</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: I don't take damage from allied spells or Skills.
flavorText: “The avalanche, once begun, cannot be stopped.” - Lissandra
name: Thrall Bulwark

description: Kill a follower with 3 or less Power, or spend 3 mana to kill a champion with 3 or less Power.
descriptionRaw: Kill a follower with 3 or less Power, or spend 3 mana to kill a champion with 3 or less Power.
flavorText: It is but a whisper upon the air, barely heard but sorely felt, that trades one life for another.
name: Soul Harvest

description: Kill a champion with 3 or less Power.
descriptionRaw: Kill a champion with 3 or less Power.
flavorText: It is but a whisper upon the air, barely heard but sorely felt, that trades one life for another.
name: Soul Harvest

description: Kill a follower with 3 or less Power.
descriptionRaw: Kill a follower with 3 or less Power.
flavorText: It is but a whisper upon the air, barely heard but sorely felt, that trades one life for another.
name: Soul Harvest

description: Kill ALL units with 3 or less Power.
descriptionRaw: Kill ALL units with 3 or less Power.
flavorText: Whoever looks upon me shall know oblivion’s touch, and they shall never be free of it.
name: Eradication

description: Each round, the first time another ally dies, draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time another ally dies, draw 1.
flavorText: "I just taught him a new trick! Wanna see it?" - Phantom Prankster
name: Grave Companion

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Heal me and your Nexus 1.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Heal me and your Nexus 1.
flavorText: Like the tear of an aurora they trace the heavens, their radiant gaze bringing calm, soothing wounds and mending what is broken.
name: Cosmic Youngling

description: Deal 4 to an enemy that attacked this round or is <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Deal 4 to an enemy that attacked this round or is Stunned.
flavorText: The stars look down upon our acts, be they good or ill. The righteous are lifted up, while the wicked suffer judgment.
name: Falling Star

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create in hand copies of the first 3 spells you played on me. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Create in hand copies of the first 3 spells you played on me.
flavorText: "Camphor has taken too much, from too many. When it is your time to die, make sure it is on your own terms. Do not give her the satisfaction." - Pantheon
name: Sacrificial Scholar

flavorText: "Well, that's new." - Fae Bladetwirler
name: Carved Bladetwirler

description: Deal 1 to a unit. Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Perilous Pastry</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to a unit. Create a Perilous Pastry in hand.
flavorText: Brace yourself.
name: Pie Toss

description: Deal 1 to anything.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to anything.
flavorText: It tastes better than it feels.
name: Perilous Pastry

description: Pick a follower. Create a 1 cost copy of it in hand and set its stats to 1|1.
descriptionRaw: Pick a follower. Create a 1 cost copy of it in hand and set its stats to 1|1.
flavorText: "Hmm... I guess smaller doesn't always mean cuter!" - Lulu
name: Condense

description: An ally with 4+ Power <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captures</style></link> a unit or an ally <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captures</style></link> a landmark.
descriptionRaw: An ally with 4+ Power Captures a unit or an ally Captures a landmark.
flavorText: “Remain still and silent. Any resistance would be unwise.” - Mageseeker Inspector
name: Search Warrant

description: Give an ally +2|+2 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+2 this round.
flavorText: “Stand strong! You are bent, not broken!” - Dauntless Vanguard
name: Form Up!

description: An ally <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captures</style></link> a landmark.
descriptionRaw: An ally Captures a landmark.
flavorText: “Remain still and silent. Any resistance would be unwise.” - Mageseeker Inspector
name: Search Warrant

description: An ally with 4+ Power <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captures</style></link> a unit.
descriptionRaw: An ally with 4+ Power Captures a unit.
flavorText: “Remain still and silent. Any resistance would be unwise.” - Mageseeker Inspector
name: Search Warrant

description:
When I'm summoned, draw a unit.
When you summon an ally, grow its stats to equal its cost.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, draw a unit.
When you summon an ally, grow its stats to equal its cost.
flavorText: The first time she saw the Altar, Cithria found herself at a loss for words. For a while, she could only stand in awe of the majesty of those honored heroes. Would she ever be bold enough to stand by their side?
name: Altar to Unity

description: I have +1|+0 for each 1 cost ally you've summoned this game.
descriptionRaw: I have +1|+0 for each 1 cost ally you've summoned this game.
flavorText: "I have to draw da horse LOTS of legs, Mister Lizard, 'cause we gotta get to da castle FAST. Uh oh, he came out a lil'... oopy goopy. And a lil' gween." - Ingvar the Younger
name: Chemtech Catermobile

description: Allies that have a different subtype than other allies in play cost 1 less.
descriptionRaw: Allies that have a different subtype than other allies in play cost 1 less.
flavorText: "I won't hurt you, friend! I came to this jungle for science, not destruction."
name: Anura & Froop

description: Deal 1 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 1 to another.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 1 to another.
flavorText: Most Piltovans could care less about the patterns of the wind. But for many Zaunites, even a stray breeze smells of salvation.
name: Divine Draft

description: If your Nexus would take non-<link=card.cardref><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcap</style></link> damage, your opponent plants 5 <link=card.cardref><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> in your deck for each damage instead.
descriptionRaw: If your Nexus would take non-Poison Puffcap damage, your opponent plants 5 Poison Puffcaps in your deck for each damage instead.
flavorText: Deep beneath the streets of Zaun, you are what you eat.
name: Sump Monument

description: To play, spend all your mana. Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Runaway Scraptrap</style></link> and grow its stats to that amount.
descriptionRaw: To play, spend all your mana. Summon a Runaway Scraptrap and grow its stats to that amount.
flavorText: "A scientist's primary responsibility is to control variables. The consequences of accidents, in a field of study such as ours--oh, I shudder to think of it!" - Professor Heimerdinger
name: Epic Scraptraption

flavorText: "Now, let me see--perhaps if we added... Oh, dear! Someone get after that contraption!" - Professor Heimerdinger
name: Runaway Scraptrap

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to half its Health, rounded up.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to half its Health, rounded up.
flavorText: Noxus is an empire built for expansion above all. Wood, stone or steel--nothing can stop the advance of a Noxian battering ram.
name: Captain Kalrix

description: Allies cost 1 less. When you play an ally, deal 2 to it.
descriptionRaw: Allies cost 1 less. When you play an ally, deal 2 to it.
flavorText: "Come, my friends, sit! The company is good and the drinks are flowing. I simply cannot wait to show you what's for supper." - Vladimir
name: Crimson Banquet Hall

description: When my bearer plays a <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Skill</style></link>, copy it.
descriptionRaw: When my bearer plays a Skill, copy it.
flavorText: The Ravenbloom Conservatory was especially renowned for its collection of texts, many of which ultimately became fuel for the roaring fire set by one notoriously difficult pupil...
name: Ravenborn Tome

description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each different subtype other allies have. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each different subtype other allies have.
flavorText: "Be careful, you imbeciles! Noxians only buy fighting beasts in perfect condition. So much as a scratch, and it's coming out of your pay!" - Big Game Tycoon
name: Bonehide Tri-tail

description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>The Poro King's Decree</style></link>.
Each round, the first time you summon another Poro, create a <link=card.baseSnax><style=AssociatedCard>Poro Snax</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: The Poro King's Decree.
Each round, the first time you summon another Poro, create a Poro Snax in hand.
levelupDescription: You've summoned 6+ other new Poros. When I level up, create a random Special Snax in hand.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've summoned 6+ other new Poros. When I level up, create a random Special Snax in hand.
flavorText: Ingvar knows potential when she sees it. Homemade appearance aside, this beloved companion could easily be the ruler of a gajillion trillion Poros--with the right amount of imagination.
name: The Poro King

description:
Draw 2 different Poro followers and grant them +1|+1.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>The Poro King</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Draw 2 different Poro followers and grant them +1|+1.
Create a The Poro King in your deck.
flavorText: They may be small, but there's strength in numbers. Round, fuzzy, terrifyingly plentiful numbers.
name: The Poro King's Council Call

description: Grant Poro allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1. Give 2 Poro allies <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Grant Poro allies everywhere +1|+1. Give 2 Poro allies Challenger this round.
flavorText: Served piping hot and bursting with bold, roasty flavors, an early morning pick-me-up will do any Poro some good.
name: Espresso Snax

description: Grant Poro allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1. Give Poro allies <link=keyword.Impact><sprite name=Impact><style=Keyword>Impact</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Grant Poro allies everywhere +1|+1. Give Poro allies Impact this round.
flavorText: With hot sausage, flaky dough, and a triple simmered spicy sauce, this treat comes in at a solid ten on Ingvar's Super Spicy Scale, and is one of her all-time favorites.
name: Pepper Snax

description: You may put any non-champion cards with the word "Poro" on them into your deck during deckbuilding.
descriptionRaw: You may put any non-champion cards with the word "Poro" on them into your deck during deckbuilding.
flavorText: "Dis is His Super-Highness Poro King's Dee-cree, for pwotection of all da peoples..." - Ingvar the Younger
name: The Poro King's Decree

description: Grant Poro allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1. Grant allied champions <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1 and a random keyword.
descriptionRaw: Grant Poro allies everywhere +1|+1. Grant allied champions everywhere +1|+1 and a random keyword.
flavorText: "All da colors DO taste different, if you tink reaaaaaallly hard about it." - Ingvar the Younger
name: Colorful Snax

description: Each round, the first time you summon another Poro, create a random Special Snax in hand.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time you summon another Poro, create a random Special Snax in hand.
flavorText: "MOOOM, come look! Mister Highness Poro King is comin' to liiiiife! Look, he really is! I'm not makin' it up this time, I pinky pwomise!" - Ingvar the Younger
name: The Poro King

description: Grant Poro allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1. <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Grant Poro allies everywhere +1|+1. Frostbite an enemy.
flavorText: This pastry boasts frosting hand-made with all the flavors of the Freljord: powder snow, packed snow, and--you guessed it--snowfall!
name: Frosted Snax

description:
<link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>: <link=card.origin><style=AssociatedCard>Many-Shaped Jungle Friends!</style></link>
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: You may <link=vocab.Disguise><style=Vocab>disguise</style></link> me as 1 of 3 two cost followers from my <link=vocab.Origin><style=Vocab>Origin</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Origin: Many-Shaped Jungle Friends!
Play: You may disguise me as 1 of 3 two cost followers from my Origin.
levelupDescription: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: You've attacked with allies that have 6+ different subtypes.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: Attack: You've attacked with allies that have 6+ different subtypes.
flavorText: Neeko can take many shapes, but her heart never changes--always leading her back to her family and her forest.
name: Neeko

description: When I level up or <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant allies that have a subtype <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When I level up or Attack: Grant allies that have a subtype everywhere +1|+1.
flavorText: "Shapes and colors, colors and shapes--Neeko can be them all!"
name: Neeko

description: You may put Bird, Cat, Dog, Elnuk, Fae, Reptile, and Spider followers into your deck during deckbuilding.
descriptionRaw: You may put Bird, Cat, Dog, Elnuk, Fae, Reptile, and Spider followers into your deck during deckbuilding.
flavorText: "Neeko will lead us to protect the jungle! Well... Neeko will lead us to Nidalee--and then we will all protect the jungle together!" - Neeko
name: Many-Shaped Jungle Friends!

description:
Summon an exact <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy of an ally, then swap them.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Neeko</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Summon an exact Ephemeral copy of an ally, then swap them.
Create a Neeko in your deck.
flavorText: "Neeko is here, Neeko is there--Neeko could be anywhere!" - Neeko
name: Neeko's Shapesplitter

description: Summon an exact <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy of an ally, then swap them.
descriptionRaw: Summon an exact Ephemeral copy of an ally, then swap them.
flavorText: "Neeko is here, Neeko is there--Neeko could be anywhere!" -Neeko
name: Shapesplitter

description: Draw 2 different Poro followers and grant them +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Draw 2 different Poro followers and grant them +1|+1.
flavorText: They may be small, but there's strength in numbers--round, fuzzy, terrifingly plentiful numbers.
name: Council Call

description: Deal 1 to a unit. <link=vocab.Spawn><style=Vocab>Spawn</style></link> 1 for each damage dealt.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to a unit. Spawn 1 for each damage dealt.
flavorText: Only the most learned can bend the elements to their will.
name: Tidal Invocation

description:
Your cards in hand have <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
When you play a card, draw 1.
descriptionRaw:
Your cards in hand have Fleeting.
When you play a card, draw 1.
flavorText: "I reckon you ought to know your hand and hold it close, or be prepared to lose it all." - Twisted Fate
name: The Swindler's Den

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a follower that has a different subtype than allies in play.
descriptionRaw: Play: Manifest a follower that has a different subtype than allies in play.
flavorText: "There's a reason we keep this scruffy little guy around: haven't had a wharf rat problem in years!" - Dreadway Deckhand
name: Deck Hunter

description: Each round, the first time you summon a 1 cost ally, refill 1 spell mana.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time you summon a 1 cost ally, refill 1 spell mana.
flavorText: "Mister Lizard, what are you doing here? You like Poros too!?" - Ingvar the Younger
name: Dragon Prince Grinzo

description:
Summon a random Husk.
Grant 1 cost allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1.
descriptionRaw:
Summon a random Husk.
Grant 1 cost allies everywhere +1|+1.
flavorText: Some Bilgewater sailors stuff cotton in their ears on the quietest nights at sea. They know well that music from beneath the waves promises nothing but a watery tomb.
name: Siren Song

description: Heal your Nexus 3 and draw 2 spells.
descriptionRaw: Heal your Nexus 3 and draw 2 spells.
flavorText: "The wind is the wanderer's only ally." - Yasuo
name: Rejuvenating Breeze

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Pick 1 of 3 <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> or <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spells in the enemy's hand or deck. Create a <link=card.cardref><style=AssociatedCard>Carvings of Divination</style></link> for it.
descriptionRaw: Play: Pick 1 of 3 Fast or Slow spells in the enemy's hand or deck. Create a Carvings of Divination for it.
flavorText: The eye unbound from the material world sees all. Blind though he may seem, those who mistake the oracle for an easy target are rebuked swiftly and without mercy.
name: All-Seeing Oracle

description: <style=Variable>Stop the chosen spell.</style>
descriptionRaw: Stop the chosen spell.
flavorText: "Watch how the sticks fall. Only when you look beyond what you see will you understand your fate." - All-Seeing Oracle
name: Carvings of Divination

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Summon a random Husk.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Summon a random Husk.
flavorText: "Hush, we're nearly there. You said you wanted to meet my friend, didn't you? Trust me--she's going to love you."
name: Airis

description:
<link=vocab.Ambush><style=Vocab>Ambush 1</style></link>
<link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Pakaa Protector</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Ambush 1
Nexus Strike: Summon a Pakaa Protector.
flavorText: Cuteness is an appearance, but ferocity is an instinct. Given time and teaching, even the littlest pakiti grow wild and strong.
name: Pakaa Cub

description:
Transform my <link=card.shadow><style=AssociatedCard>Shadow in the Brush</style></link> into a <link=card.parent><style=AssociatedCard>Pakaa Cub</style></link>. 
If my <link=card.shadow><style=AssociatedCard>Shadow in the Brush</style></link> leaves play, <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> me.
descriptionRaw:
Transform my Shadow in the Brush into a Pakaa Cub. 
If my Shadow in the Brush leaves play, Obliterate me.
flavorText: Make them pay.
name: Pakaa Cub's Ambush

flavorText: Pakiti are naturally inquisitive, and prone to jumping four-paws first into unfamiliar situations. With new dangers lurking in the jungle, pack guardians keep a closer eye than ever on their cubs--even if you can't see them.
name: Pakaa Protector

description: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a card with <link=vocab.Ambush><style=Vocab>Ambush</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Manifest a card with Ambush.
flavorText: Jungle reconnaissance is the least desirable assignment for one reason above all: it is full of surprises.
name: Facecheck

description: Give an ally +2|+0 this round. If it is a <link=card.shadow><style=AssociatedCard>Shadow in the Brush</style></link>, give it +2|+2 instead.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+0 this round. If it is a Shadow in the Brush, give it +2|+2 instead.
flavorText: "Walk softly, pakiti. Strike true." - Nidalee
name: Prowl

description: <link=vocab.Ambush><style=Vocab>Ambush 2</style></link>
descriptionRaw: Ambush 2
levelupDescription: I've seen you summon or transform 4 other allies.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen you summon or transform 4 other allies.
flavorText: "I will always protect you, lizard girl. We will make these poachers pay. Together." - Nidalee
name: Nidalee

description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round. If it is a <link=card.shadow><style=AssociatedCard>Shadow in the Brush</style></link>, give it +2|+2 instead.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Nidalee</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round. If it is a Shadow in the Brush, give it +2|+2 instead.
Create a Nidalee in your deck.
flavorText: "Walk softly, pakiti. Strike true." - Nidalee
name: Nidalee's Prowl

description:
<link=vocab.Ambush><style=Vocab>Ambush 2</style></link>
<link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Transform me back into <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Nidalee</style></link> and create a <link=card.javelin><style=AssociatedCard>Javelin Toss</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
Ambush 2
Nexus Strike: Transform me back into Nidalee and create a Javelin Toss in hand.
flavorText: "The men call her Kashdaji as an insult. But she commands the jungle--and they cannot hide the fact that they are afraid." -from Anura's field journal, day 32
name: Packmother Nidalee

description:
Transform my <link=card.shadow><style=AssociatedCard>Shadow in the Brush</style></link> into a <link=card.parent><style=AssociatedCard>Nidalee</style></link>. 
If my <link=card.shadow><style=AssociatedCard>Shadow in the Brush</style></link> leaves play, <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> me.
descriptionRaw:
Transform my Shadow in the Brush into a Nidalee. 
If my Shadow in the Brush leaves play, Obliterate me.
flavorText: Make them pay.
name: Nidalee's Ambush

description:
Transform my <link=card.shadow><style=AssociatedCard>Shadow in the Brush</style></link> into a <link=card.parent><style=AssociatedCard>Packmother Nidalee</style></link>. 
If my <link=card.shadow><style=AssociatedCard>Shadow in the Brush</style></link> leaves play, <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> me.
descriptionRaw:
Transform my Shadow in the Brush into a Packmother Nidalee. 
If my Shadow in the Brush leaves play, Obliterate me.
flavorText: Make them pay.
name: Packmother Nidalee's Ambush

description: What could be hiding here?
descriptionRaw: What could be hiding here?
flavorText: You never know what could be concealed in the underbrush.
name: Shadow in the Brush

description: Deal  4 to an enemy. If there are no enemies when I'm played, I target the enemy Nexus instead.
descriptionRaw: Deal  4 to an enemy. If there are no enemies when I'm played, I target the enemy Nexus instead.
flavorText: "You had your chance." - Nidalee
name: Javelin Toss

description:
<link=vocab.Ambush><style=Vocab>Ambush 3</style></link>
When I transform from <link=card.ambush><style=AssociatedCard>Avenging Vastaya's Ambush</style></link>, stop all enemy <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spells, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spells, and <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Skills</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Ambush 3
When I transform from Avenging Vastaya's Ambush, stop all enemy Fast spells, Slow spells, and Skills.
flavorText: "Do not fear, little ones. I will protect you--and see my debt to Nidalee repaid."
name: Avenging Vastaya

description: Stop all enemy <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spells, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spells, and <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Skills</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Stop all enemy Fast spells, Slow spells, and Skills.
flavorText: "Last time, your cowardly tricks took me by surprise. That will not happen again." -Kuulcan
name: Enough!

description:
Transform my <link=card.shadow><style=AssociatedCard>Shadow in the Brush</style></link> into an <link=card.parent><style=AssociatedCard>Avenging Vastaya</style></link>. 
If my <link=card.shadow><style=AssociatedCard>Shadow in the Brush</style></link> leaves play, <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> me.
descriptionRaw:
Transform my Shadow in the Brush into an Avenging Vastaya. 
If my Shadow in the Brush leaves play, Obliterate me.
flavorText: Make them pay.
name: Avenging Vastaya's Ambush

description:
<link=vocab.Ambush><style=Vocab>Ambush 0</style></link>
When I'm summoned or transform, grant the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Ambush 0
When I'm summoned or transform, grant the weakest enemy Vulnerable.
flavorText: "This here beauty can turn even a novice into a tree-climbing, boulder-jumping professional. Cost me a fortune, but I'm sure I can pay off those loans with the skin of a rare beastie or two..."
name: All-Terrain Trooper

description:
<link=vocab.Ambush><style=Vocab>Ambush 4</style></link>
When I transform, summon a <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Aurora Hallunatis</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
Ambush 4
When I transform, summon a Aurora Hallunatis.
flavorText: "How I would like to see one myself! Most of the expeditioners believe Aurora Hallunatis is a myth, but one young man swears otherwise. He tells me that the bird is brilliantly colored with a wingspan as long as a man is tall. To look into its eyes, he confides in me one night, is to understand that you are prey." - From Anura's field journal, day 21
name: Aurora Hallunatis

description:
<link=vocab.Ambush><style=Vocab>Ambush 3</style></link>
When I transform from <link=card.ambush><style=AssociatedCard>Blimp-Pack Poacher's Ambush</style></link>, the next time I block or am blocked this round, <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Capture</style></link> my enemy.
descriptionRaw:
Ambush 3
When I transform from Blimp-Pack Poacher's Ambush, the next time I block or am blocked this round, Capture my enemy.
flavorText: "Ha! Try and get me now, silly beasts. Even gravity can't defeat the superior species!"
name: Blimp-Pack Poacher

description: <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Capture</style></link> my enemy.
descriptionRaw: Capture my enemy.
flavorText: "A positively resplendid find! Rowain is sure to reward me for this." - Blimp-Pack Poacher
name: Secure the Goods

description:
Transform my <link=card.shadow><style=AssociatedCard>Shadow in the Brush</style></link> into a <link=card.parent><style=AssociatedCard>Blimp-Pack Poacher</style></link>. 
If my <link=card.shadow><style=AssociatedCard>Shadow in the Brush</style></link> leaves play, <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> me.
descriptionRaw:
Transform my Shadow in the Brush into a Blimp-Pack Poacher. 
If my Shadow in the Brush leaves play, Obliterate me.
flavorText: Make them pay.
name: Blimp-Pack Poacher's Ambush

description: When I'm summoned or the first time an ally transforms each round, grant the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or the first time an ally transforms each round, grant the weakest enemy Vulnerable.
flavorText: "Blood on the wind." - Nidalee
name: Bushwhack Trap

description: When you play a follower, transform me into an exact copy of it this round.
descriptionRaw: When you play a follower, transform me into an exact copy of it this round.
flavorText: "And dis here is da MOST BE-YOUUU-TI-FUL and favorite stop on da tour. So many people liked my tour dat dey built a BIIIG STRONG CHIP, who will be a stop on da tour forever and ever. Let's go say "HIII BIG CHIP!" Big Chip loves EVERYbody, and ex-speshal-ty all the people who have come along on his tour." - Adventures with Chip, part 6
name: Valley of Imitation

description:
Transform my <link=card.shadow><style=AssociatedCard>Shadow in the Brush</style></link> into an <link=card.parent><style=AssociatedCard>All-Terrain Trooper</style></link>. 
If my <link=card.shadow><style=AssociatedCard>Shadow in the Brush</style></link> leaves play, <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> me.
descriptionRaw:
Transform my Shadow in the Brush into an All-Terrain Trooper. 
If my Shadow in the Brush leaves play, Obliterate me.
flavorText: Make them pay.
name: All-Terrain Trooper's Ambush

description: <link=vocab.Ambush><style=Vocab>Ambush 5</style></link>
descriptionRaw: Ambush 5
flavorText: As its oldest residents, some say pairofants hold the memory and heart of the jungle itself. Though normally gentle creatures, they will not hesitate to defend their home against any threat--great or small.
name: Towering Pairofant

description:
Transform my <link=card.shadow><style=AssociatedCard>Shadow in the Brush</style></link> into a <link=card.parent><style=AssociatedCard>Towering Pairofant</style></link>. 
If my <link=card.shadow><style=AssociatedCard>Shadow in the Brush</style></link> leaves play, <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> me.
descriptionRaw:
Transform my Shadow in the Brush into a Towering Pairofant. 
If my Shadow in the Brush leaves play, Obliterate me.
flavorText: Make them pay.
name: Towering Pairofant's Ambush

description: The first time an ally transforms, grant me +2|+1.
descriptionRaw: The first time an ally transforms, grant me +2|+1.
flavorText: "Small omnivorous mammals covered in bristle-like spikes, which may be released at high velocities when disturbed. Tail is barbed and agile, likely used as a defensive weapon. According to experienced expeditioners, the creatures are notoriously grouchy and difficult to handle..." - From Anura's field journal, day 3
name: Bristlehog

description:
Transform my <link=card.shadow><style=AssociatedCard>Shadow in the Brush</style></link> into an <link=card.parent><style=AssociatedCard>Aurora Hallunatis</style></link>. 
If my <link=card.shadow><style=AssociatedCard>Shadow in the Brush</style></link> leaves play, <link=vocab.Obliterate><style=Vocab>Obliterate</style></link> me.
descriptionRaw:
Transform my Shadow in the Brush into an Aurora Hallunatis. 
If my Shadow in the Brush leaves play, Obliterate me.
flavorText: Make them pay.
name: Aurora Hallunatis's Ambush

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a card with <link=vocab.Ambush><style=Vocab>Ambush</style></link>.
When an ally transforms, double its Power and Health.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Manifest a card with Ambush.
When an ally transforms, double its Power and Health.
flavorText: "You lost everything to WHAT? A scientist and a reptile freak? Well, what are you standing around for, you buffoons? Go out there and get my money back!"
name: Big Game Tycoon

description: When you summon an ally, grow its Health to equal its Power.
descriptionRaw: When you summon an ally, grow its Health to equal its Power.
flavorText: Though the meaning of this temple has long been lost to time, its stone guardian still stands, unbent by the weight of many avalanches. Rimed with frost, he seems to be imbued with some strange and alluring light...
name: Temple to True Ice

description: <link=keyword.Plunder><style=Keyword>Plunder</style></link>: Grow an ally's stats to mine.
descriptionRaw: Plunder: Grow an ally's stats to mine.
flavorText: Though the snowy razorclaw primarily hunts small mammals,  this Freljordian beast has enough claws to make nearly anything into a meal.
name: Snowy Razorclaw

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Pick an ally. Grant it and all other allies that share a subtype with it +1|+1 or <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a follower that shares a subtype with it.
descriptionRaw: Play: Pick an ally. Grant it and all other allies that share a subtype with it +1|+1 or Manifest a follower that shares a subtype with it.
flavorText: Self-appointed Poro supervisor and explorer of the Freljord, Ingvar is sure that adventure is out there--and she's going to find it.
name: Ingvar the Younger

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally and all other allies that share a subtype with it +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an ally and all other allies that share a subtype with it +1|+1.
flavorText: Self-appointed Poro supervisor and explorer of the Freljord, Ingvar is sure that adventure is out there--and she's going to find it.
name: Ingvar the Younger

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a follower that shares a subtype with an ally.
descriptionRaw: Play: Manifest a follower that shares a subtype with an ally.
flavorText: Self-appointed Poro supervisor and explorer of the Freljord, Ingvar is sure that adventure is out there--and she's going to find it.
name: Ingvar the Younger

description: <link=keyword.Elemental Skill><sprite name=ElementalSkill><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal 2 to ALL other units.
descriptionRaw: Play: Deal 2 to ALL other units.
flavorText: The violence of the crystalline stormraptor is indiscriminate and instantaneous, turning the tide of battle within moments. The bird is considered by many to the first omen of a great and terrible storm--one meant to reshape the bones of the earth itself.
name: Crystalline Stormraptor

description: Deal 2 to ALL other units.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to ALL other units.
flavorText: "You want to know how to survive the shriek of the stormraptor? Ha. When you hear the bird's call, the only thing left to do is pray." - Avarosan Outrider
name: Piercing Lightning

description: When I'm summoned, grant the top 3 units in your deck +1|+1. If an ally has a different subtype than me, draw 1 of those units.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant the top 3 units in your deck +1|+1. If an ally has a different subtype than me, draw 1 of those units.
flavorText: With a bony exterior belying its big heart, these reliable steeds are vital for clearing icy mountain passes.
name: Glacial Saurian

description:
When I'm summoned, summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Necrotic Nestlings</style></link>. 
When another ally dies, <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>drain</style></link> 1 from the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, summon 2 Necrotic Nestlings. 
When another ally dies, drain 1 from the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: Found only in the darkest reaches of the Shadow Isles, these spiders secrete a deadly necrovenom, which numbs the skin even as it begins to rot the flesh.
name: Necrotic Arachnoid

flavorText: Where there's one, there's always more... and necrovenom works fast.
name: Necrotic Nestling

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: If an ally has a different subtype than me, give an enemy <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
descriptionRaw: Play: If an ally has a different subtype than me, give an enemy -2|-0 this round.
flavorText: Tufted webspinners take great care in crafting their nests. They are especially doting on their spiderlings... but equally vicious when it comes to potential threats.
name: Tufted Webspinner

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create in deck an exact copy of your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> <link=card.selfref><style=AssociatedCard>Proliferating Darkwraith</style></link> in deck, then double the stats of <link=card.selfref><style=AssociatedCard>Proliferating Darkwraiths</style></link> in deck.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Create in deck an exact copy of your strongest Proliferating Darkwraith in deck, then double the stats of Proliferating Darkwraiths in deck.
flavorText: "This Mist has taught me many things. Most importantly, it has taught me to know when to run." - Ixtali Sentinel
name: Proliferating Darkwraith

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: When another ally gains Power from <link=keyword.Hallowed><sprite name=Hallowed><style=Keyword>Hallowed</style></link>, so does my bearer.
descriptionRaw: Attack: When another ally gains Power from Hallowed, so does my bearer.
flavorText: "With a good pair of scissors, and quality thread, you can set almost anything aright!" - Gwen
name: Sacred Shears

description: For the top 9 cards in your deck, draw each Dragon and reduce their costs to 0 this round, then shuffle the rest into your deck.
descriptionRaw: For the top 9 cards in your deck, draw each Dragon and reduce their costs to 0 this round, then shuffle the rest into your deck.
flavorText: "To know one dragon is to master the self. To know many is to master the world." - Ottrani Dragon-Worshiper
name: Age of Dragons

description: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial that costs 7 or more, or pay 8 to reduce the cost of your Celestials <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> by half, rounded up.
descriptionRaw: Invoke a Celestial that costs 7 or more, or pay 8 to reduce the cost of your Celestials everywhere by half, rounded up.
flavorText: The Arbiter stands perennial watch as blessings of the heavens descend.
name: Cosmic Call

description: Reduce the cost of your Celestials <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> by half, rounded up.
descriptionRaw: Reduce the cost of your Celestials everywhere by half, rounded up.
flavorText: The Arbiter stands perennial watch as blessings of the heavens descend.
name: Cosmic Call

description: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial that costs 7 or more.
descriptionRaw: Invoke a Celestial that costs 7 or more.
flavorText: The Arbiter stands perennial watch as blessings of the heavens descend.
name: Cosmic Call

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally and grant it my stats.
descriptionRaw: Play: Recall an ally and grant it my stats.
flavorText: "There are few sights more splendid than the meeting of the sun and the moon." - Diana
name: Star-Crossed Lovers

description: When one or more of your traps or boons activate, plant 2 of it in that player's deck.
descriptionRaw: When one or more of your traps or boons activate, plant 2 of it in that player's deck.
flavorText: Nobody can say how long Mister Thrift has been collecting, or where he came from. He seems friendly enough--never mind that troublesome trail of tripping hazards he leaves in his wake.
name: Mister Thrift

description: When I'm discarded, <link=vocab.Equip><style=Vocab>Equip</style></link> me to a random unequipped ally.
descriptionRaw: When I'm discarded, Equip me to a random unequipped ally.
flavorText: "I can't lie--I'm prone to losing my tools. This one, though, always pops back up right when I need it!" - Safety Inspector
name: Return-o Wrench

description:
When I'm summoned, plant a <link=card.portal><style=AssociatedCard>Mysterious Portal</style></link> in the top 4 cards of your deck.
When you summon a created ally, grant it <link=keyword.Impact><sprite name=Impact><style=Keyword>Impact</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, plant a Mysterious Portal in the top 4 cards of your deck.
When you summon a created ally, grant it Impact.
flavorText: At the forefront of any research, there are bound to be surprises--luckily, this is a fortunate one.
name: Portal Scholar

description: When I'm summoned, grant other allies that have subtypes +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Impact><sprite name=Impact><style=Keyword>Impact</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant other allies that have subtypes +1|+1 and Impact.
flavorText: Unfortunately for this crew of Piltovan poachers, they only look harmless.
name: Ferocious Fluffs

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Pick a unit from the top 5 cards of your deck that costs 3 or less. Summon it and place the rest into your deck.
descriptionRaw: Play: Pick a unit from the top 5 cards of your deck that costs 3 or less. Summon it and place the rest into your deck.
flavorText: The Demacian draft sergeant carries a weighty responsibility. His recruits will go on to occupy many different posts, all united in their duty to and love for Demacia.
name: Scrutinizing Sergeant

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: If an ally has a different subtype than me, <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a Demacian spell.
descriptionRaw: Play: If an ally has a different subtype than me, Manifest a Demacian spell.
flavorText: "Recording first confirmed sighting of the lionhawk in nearly fifty years. Beautiful blue crest, intelligent eyes. Body is armored, but bones are light enough for at least tree-climbing, if not limited gliding. Wing structures almost reminiscent of Demacian silverwings. Will return with more measurements." - From Anura's field journal, day 12
name: Crested Lionhawk

description: Spells that cost less than 3 cost 3 instead.
descriptionRaw: Spells that cost less than 3 cost 3 instead.
flavorText: "Silence! This is no mere game, as you claim, but the cloak of some insidious arcane engagement. I mean to expose you as a cheat and a mage, you old scoundrel--even if I have to burn this whole establishment down to do it!"
name: Mageseeker Junior

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant other <link=keyword.Formidable><sprite name=Formidable><style=Keyword>Formidable</style></link> allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +0|+1.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant other Formidable allies everywhere +0|+1.
flavorText: A long-time companion of the Durand family, Balen's great size belies his gentle precision. Though he began as an assistant, Balen is greatly gifted in the craft and uniquely inspired in its practice--and the Durands are proud to call him their friend.
name: Balen the Benevolent
